title: How to Get a Kanto Starter Pokémon in Pokémon X and Y

steps.title: Get to the point in the game where you go to Lumiose City for the first time.
steps.content: Get to the point in the game where you go to Lumiose City for the first time.

steps.title: Go west to the Sycamore Pokémon Lab and go inside.
steps.content: Go west to the Sycamore Pokémon Lab and go inside.

steps.title: Take the elevator up to the 3rd floor.
steps.content: Take the elevator up to the 3rd floor.

steps.title: You'll find Professor Sycamore, who will challenge you to a battle.
steps.content: You'll find Professor Sycamore, who will challenge you to a battle. He uses Bulbasaur, Charmander, and Squirtle.

steps.title: Beat him, and he'll let you have one of the starters.
steps.content: Beat him, and he'll let you have one of the starters. You only get one per file, so pick carefully.
